Name.value: White River Tools of Citizenship - Black Bart's Flaming Dig Tools(Rebuilded)

Description.value: Gather tons of iron and craft a bunch of Iron Pickaxe and Shovels to obtain a set of named Flaming Steel Shovel and Pickaxe tools.

Author.value: Shouden Kalferas(Code), morggin(Lore), Aeyvi Kalferas(Quest Text), RichardPaul(Poem)(Rebuilded by 7DaystoDie.JP)
